price: Nanso wͻn a, wͻ’dii bͻne no sesaa asεm no a yε’ka kyerεε wͻn no kͻfaa foforͻ. Enti Y’esianee ͻyare dͻm asotwee (anaa ͻhaw ahodoͻ) fri soro baa wͻn a wͻ’dii bͻne no so εnam bͻne a na wͻ’die no ho nti.
arabic: فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ قَوۡلًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي قِيلَ لَهُمۡ فَأَنزَلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fabaddala alladhīna ẓalamū qawlan ghayra alladhī qīla lahum fa-anzalnā ʿalā alladhīna ẓalamū rij'zan mina al-samāi bimā kānū yafsuqūna
